Schema.description: Identifier for the schema where the schema version will be created.

properties.name: RegistryName
properties.description: Name of the registry to identify where the Schema is located.

type.description: Name of the registry to identify where the Schema is located.

properties.name: SchemaArn
properties.description: Amazon Resource Name for the Schema. This attribute can be used to uniquely represent the Schema.

type.description: Amazon Resource Name for the Schema. This attribute can be used to uniquely represent the Schema.

properties.name: SchemaName
properties.description: Name of the schema. This parameter requires RegistryName to be provided.

type.description: Name of the schema. This parameter requires RegistryName to be provided.

resource.description: This resource represents an individual schema version of a schema defined in Glue Schema Registry.

properties.name: SchemaDefinition
properties.description: Complete definition of the schema in plain-text.

type.description: Complete definition of the schema in plain-text.

attributes.description: This resource represents an individual schema version of a schema defined in Glue Schema Registry.

properties.name: VersionId
properties.description: Represents the version ID associated with the schema version.

type.description: Represents the version ID associated with the schema version.
